oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic agriculture in Palimbang. Reviving the bayanihan spirit for food and peace
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pilar , Reagan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development
Social aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic farmers in Palimbang, Sultan Kudarat helped revived the old culture of bayanihan (collective action) to ensure food security in the community. From using chemical seeds and inputs, farmers are now successful harvesting enough yields for their consumption, as well as surplus products that they market within and outside the community.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pilar , Reagan (2014) Organic agriculture in Palimbang. Reviving the bayanihan spirit for food and peace. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
